official_title: To establish a silver congressional commemorative medal for members of the United States Armed Forces who have served in a combat zone during World War II, the Korean conflict, the Vietnam era, or the Persian Gulf conflict.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to design and strike a silver commemorative medal for members of the U.S. armed forces who served in a combat zone during World War II, the Korean conflict, the Vietnam era, or the Persian Gulf conflict.

titles.title: To establish a silver congressional commemorative medal for members of the United States Armed Forces who have served in a combat zone during World War II, the Korean conflict, the Vietnam era, or the Persian Gulf conflict.
